name: Counseling/Psychotherapy
description: The therapy sessions are provided by licensed volunteer psychotherapists who are part of the community. To see if their Free Therapy Program is a proper fit for your counseling needs, or if you have general questions about the program, please call (510) 809-0216 and leave a message. WCRC’s Free Therapy Program offers women, nonbinary individuals, and caregivers with counseling support related to cancer. Each therapy client receives (12) sessions free-of-charge in their one-of-a-kind psychotherap
